title: Otaku-Kun To No Kyorikan Ga Bagutteru Onna Tomodachi
alternative_title: オタクくんとの距離感がバグってる女友達 ; Otakukun to no Kyorikan ga Bagutteru Onna Tomodachi ; A Female Friend with a Strangely Close Relationship with an Otaku.
status: オタクくんとの距離感がバグってる女友達 ; Otakukun to no Kyorikan ga Bagutteru Onna Tomodachi ; A Female Friend with a Strangely Close Relationship with an Otaku.
description:
Description :
        A friend I used to hang out with, who I thought was a guy, turned out to be a girl. And, to make things more interesting, she has a strangely close sense of distance with me, her childhood friend (an otaku).
This is the story of these two friends sharing a room together.
